mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO Address ( address, name, mobile, isDefault, userId, isActive, createTime, updateTime ) VALUES ( #{address}, #{name}, #{mobile}, #{isDefault}, #{userId}, 1, (select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) * 1000), (select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) * 1000) )
